description: Erection of hip to gable and rear dormer roof extensions and installation 3x Velux windows to facilitate loft conversion.
decision_conditions: The erection of hip to gable and rear dormer roof extensions and the installation 3x Velux windows to facilitate a loft conversion falls within the parameters of permitted development as set out under Schedule 2, Part 1, Class  B and C of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).
Condition 3 (Land Contamination) - RBK Environmental Health officer has reviewed the information provided and is satisfied this can now be approved.

Please provide proposed loft floor plan at a recognised scale of 1:50 or 1:100, providing a scale bar, showing the outline of entire floor plan, not just part and all key dimensions for the proposed works.The submitted proposed loft plan is labelled as roof plan. Please revise it as the proposed loft plan.
